response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the first subtask, which is to take the prawn from the plate. The robot now has the prawn in its inventory. The next step is to turn on the stove.
response.subtask:
(1) Take the prawn from the plate
(2) Turn on the stove
(3) Cook the prawn on the stove
(4) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Turn on the stove
    stove = registry(env,"stove_igwqpj_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
